game.name: Monster Truck 2020
game.description:
It is time to drive something new and challenging! Reaching out to a huge collection of monster trucks and choosing a one to ride over the extremely tricky tracks can allow you to be entered a completely new fun environment. Driving these cool vehicles will also be enough to satisfy your fantasy for speed and driving like a free rider. And, the best part is that you can get all such fun and thrill for free without download in Monster Truck 2020.

Grab your truck, tighten your seat and get ready to break the speed limits to execute a number of death-defying stunts! Common boys! You would have full control on your chosen truck. Put your fingers on the arrow keys to press the accelerator without waiting for the red light to turn into the green in this HTML5 truck game! Choose from any mode out of two options including desert and off-road stunts! In each mode, there are 10 unique levels to play through. 

Perform stunts and see your truck flying high in the sky and enjoy the realistic surroundings in this cool car racing game! Track the health of truck by looking at the top middle portion of the screen! Do not forget to take your eyes off the timer to complete your mission before the time runs out. The top right corner of the screen will show you how much money you have earned as of now. Complete missions, earn money and buy new truck models in this awesome truck driving simulator!
